Title: Killing the goose
Source: Proc. Inst. Mech. Eng. Part H J. Eng. Med.
Abstract: © IMechE 2017.The regulatory framework for implanted medical devices is preventing severely impaired people from benefitting from rehabilitation research. Consequently, research effort is wasted and we are unable to use implants to reduce the costs of healthcare. The framework should be altered so that it is economically possible to get new devices for small patient groups into widespread use.
